dict.acceptation: 规定，条项，条款；预备，准备，设备；供应，（一批）供应品；生活物质，储备物资；
为…提供所需物品（尤指食物）；

sent.orig: It's a bill that includes provision after provision authored by both Democrats and Republicans.
sent.trans: 该法案包含了民主党和共和党共同授权的持续的援助供应。

sent.orig: Press contract provision provision, bilateral collaboration should last to next year summer.
sent.trans: 按合同条款规定，双方的合作要持续到明年夏季。

sent.orig: Where there special provision in any other law or administrative regulation the special provision shall prevail.
sent.trans: 其他法律、行政法规另有规定的，适用其规定。

sent.orig: Still do not have relevant provision at present.
However, China's present civil law has not any definite provision concerning the easement.
sent.trans: 然而，我国现行民事立法没有地役权的明确规定。
